data.eml:eml: New insights into the identities of the elasmobranch fauna of Sri Lanka

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fernando, Daniel, Bown, Rosalind M. K., Tanna, Akshay, Gobiraj, Ramajeyam, Ralicki, Hannah, Jockusch, Elizabeth L., Ebert, David A., Jensen, Kirsten, Caira, Janine N. (2019): New insights into the identities of the elasmobranch fauna of Sri Lanka. Zootaxa 4585 (2): 201-238, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4585.2.1
